Detailed Description

This class is used to store descriptions of the methods of an entity.

MethodDescription::Component  component,
const char *  interfaceName

This method initialises this collection of methods from a data section.

NOTE: Despite its name, this method may be called more than once to add the methods from implemented interfaces.
